source_text: Kevaka o sivia na 70 na yabaki ka vakila na ivakatakilakila ni COVID-19, qarai vakatotolo na veivuke vakavuniwai.
target_text: If you are over 70 and have COVID-19 symptoms, seek medical care.

source_text: Cava na tiko vakatikitiki kevaka sa oti na 14 na siga ka sega ni laurai e dua na ivakatakilakila me 3 na siga sa sivi.
target_text: Stop isolating if you have completed 14 days and had no symptoms for at least 3 days.

source_text: E levu na mate e rawa ni qaravi ka vakavuna na ivakatakilakila e vaka na dementia.
target_text: Many treatable illnesses can cause dementia-like symptoms.

source_text: O ira na tamata cakacaka e vakila na ivakatakilakila era rawa ni taura na ivola ni 14 na siga ni tiko vakatikitiki e vale.
target_text: Workers with symptoms can get a medical certificate for 14 days of self-isolation.

source_text: Kevaka e sega ni laurai na ivakatakilakila, vakatikitikitaki iko mai na siga e caka kina na veivakatovotovo.
target_text: If they have no symptoms, self-isolate from the day of their test.

source_text: Na ivola e vakamacalataka na ivakatakilakila taumada kei na kena vakadeitaki na dementia.
target_text: The booklet explains early warning signs and diagnosis of dementia.

source_text: Ira era tauvi dau cegu oca me ra vakaraica vakavinaka na nodrau ivakatakilakila ni COVID-19.
target_text: People with asthma should monitor their symptoms closely during COVID-19.

source_text: Kevaka sa bibi na ivakatakilakila, gole vakatotolo ki na vale ni bula e qarava vakatabakidua na COVID-19.
target_text: If your symptoms become severe, go immediately to a dedicated health facility.

source_text: Qarai veivuke kevaka e sega ni yali na ivakatakilakila.
target_text: Seek help if symptoms persist.

source_text: Vakasuka tale me laurai kevaka e veisau na ivakatakilakila.
target_text: Return for follow-up if symptoms change.

source_text: Kevaka o tauvi dau cegu oca ka vakila na ivakatakilakila ni COVID-19, gole vakatotolo ki na screening clinic.
target_text: If you have asthma and COVID-19 symptoms, visit a screening clinic immediately.

source_text: Kakua ni gole ki na vanua era le levu kina na lewenivanua.
target_text: Stay away from crowded areas.

source_text: Kakua ni wasea na iyaya ni kana kei ira na tani.
target_text: Do not share utensils.
